description: Blue Origin’s NS-33 launch has been postponed again due to high winds in Texas. The suborbital mission, which will carry six passengers aboard New Shepard, marks the company’s 13th crewed flight. A new launch date has not yet been confirmed, as teams continue to monitor weather conditions at the West Texas site.
title: Blue Origin’s Crewed Suborbital Launch Delayed Again Due to Weather Conditions

description: A buried magma plume beneath Oman’s Salma Plateau may have nudged India’s tectonic path during its collision with Eurasia, scientists report. Named “Dani,” the amagmatic plume caused no eruptions but likely altered continental motion 40 million years ago. This discovery redefines how silent, deep mantle forces can reshape continents without leaving volcanic signatures on the surface.
title: ‘Ghost’ Plume Found Beneath Oman May Explain India’s Ancient Tectonic Shift

description: A Tongji University study shows green roofs can trap most rainborne microplastics, with soil capturing the majority. If all Shanghai rooftops went green, they could remove 56.2 metric tons of microplastics each year, highlighting a promising method for tackling urban pollution.
title: Green Rooftops Could Help Cities Like Shanghai Filter Out Tons of Microplastics from Rainwater

description: Cleaner (2025) is a British thriller starring Daisy Ridley as a former military operative turned window cleaner who must save 300 hostages from eco-terrorists in a London skyscraper. Directed by Martin Campbell, the film streams on Lionsgate Play from June 27 and has earned mixed-to-positive reviews.
title: Cleaner (2025) OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: The Vera C. Rubin Observatory will unveil its first images on June 23 via a global livestream. Captured using a groundbreaking 3,200-megapixel camera, the images mark a major milestone in the observatory’s mission to explore dark matter and dynamic cosmic phenomena. The LSST survey will scan the southern sky for a decade, transforming our view of the universe.
title: Rubin Observatory to Unveil First Cosmic Images with World’s Largest Digital Camera

description: SpaceX’s Transporter-14 mission on June 23 will carry over 150 capsules of DNA and cremated remains into orbit for Celestis. The flight, in partnership with The Exploration Company, will briefly orbit Earth before reentry. It marks Celestis’ 25th space memorial mission and offers a symbolic journey for participants, including the youngest European to send DNA to space.
title: SpaceX to Launch Over 150 Memorial DNA Capsules into Orbit on Celestis’ Perseverance Flight

description: The Gilded Age has finally dropped on your digital screens with its all-new season three. This season, the plot will revolve around the central families, and there will be a clash of money, power, and love. Streaming Now only on JioHotstar.
title: The Gilded Age OTT Release: Where to Watch This HBO Original Series

description: Yugi is a Tamil Thriller movie that has finally reached your digital screens. The movie stars Kathir, Narain, and Natty in the lead roles. The plot follows a gripping investigation of a missing girl, led by a detective, whose world turns upside down when he uncovers shocking truths. Watch Now.
title: Yugi Now Available for Streaming on Aha Tamil: Everything You Need to Know

description: Meta held discussions with AI search startup Perplexity AI about a possible takeover. The talks with Meta, which have not previously been reported, highlight Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg’s willingness to use deals and big hires to catch up in the AI race.
title: Meta Discussed Buying Perplexity Before Investing in Scale

description: Tesla's first set of cars have arrived in India — Model Y rear-wheel drive SUVs shipped from Tesla’s China factory. Tesla is set to open its first showroom in Mumbai as early as mid July, which will be followed by one in New Delhi, according to the people familiar with the matter.
title: Tesla Set to Open India Showrooms in July With Made-in-China EVs

description: AI+ Pulse and AI+ Nova 5G smartphones will launch in India in July, and will be available exclusively through Flipkart. They will be offered in Black, Blue, Green, Pink and Purple colourways. For optics, both smartphones will carry 50-megapixel dual rear camera units. They will support AI imaging and editing tools. The smartphones will fearture a water-drop notch for the front camera.
title: AI+ Pulse, AI+ Nova 5G Confirmed to Launch in India in July; Design, Colour Options Revealed

description: Amazon Diagnostics was launched by Amazon India on Sunday. The new service is an expansion of Amazon Medical, which includes its Pharmacy and teleconsultation services as well. The diagnostics service, which was developed in collaboration with Orange Health Labs, is currently available in six Indian cities, including Bengaluru, Delhi, Gurugram, Noida, Mumbai, and Hyderabad.
title: Amazon Diagnostics Launched in India, Offers Doorstep Sample Collection in Six Cities

description: Apple executives have reportedly discussed the possibility of purchasing Perplexity to alleviate its AI woes. As per the report, the Cupertino-based tech giant has held internal discussions about the acquisition, and it has been weighed by the head of acquisitions and mergers, Adrian Perica. If such a deal goes ahead, the iPhone maker might use the technology to develop a native AI-powered search engine.
title: Apple Reportedly in Talks to Acquire Perplexity AI to Strengthen Its Artificial Intelligence Efforts

description: Apple was sued on Friday by shareholders in a proposed securities fraud class action. The complaint covers shareholders who suffered potentially hundreds of billions of dollars of losses in the year ending June 9, when Apple introduced several features and aesthetic improvements for its products but kept AI changes modest.
title: Apple Sued by Shareholders for Allegedly Overstating AI Progress

description: Death Stranding 2 is bigger and better and bolder. It deepens the themes and ideas introduced in Death Stranding and poses new questions relevant and important to our living reality today. It is wilder, more confounding, less trusting of us as a people than its predecessor — it comes with the tagline “Should we have connected?”. Make what you will of that, but Kojima is clearly concerned with the consequences of a shared global society — of connecting people in a world desperate to tear itself apart.
title: Death Stranding 2: On the Beach Review — Ode to a Dying Planet

description: Google is looking to tweak its search results to better highlight rival services, aiming to avoid a hefty EU antitrust fine. This move follows charges from the European Commission accusing the tech giant of violating the Digital Markets Act by prioritising its own services like Google Shopping, Hotels, and Flights on its Search browser.
title: Google Offers to Tweak Search Results to Promote Rivals, Stave Off EU Antitrust Fine

description: Honor Magic V5 is confirmed to be offered in Dawn Gold, Silk Road Dunhuang, Velvet Black, and Warm White (translated from Chinese) shades. It will be available with up to 16GB of RAM and up to 1TB of storage. The handset will measure 8.8mm in thickness in the folded state. The Magic V5 will be unveiled in China on July 2.
title: Honor Magic V5 Teased to Measure 8.8mm Thick; Colours, RAM and Storage Details Revealed

description: Apple has updated its iPhone and iPad product pages across the European Union to comply with new EU regulations, displaying energy efficiency labels for devices. These labels include a grade and important details on battery longevity, repairability, impact resistance, and IP rating. Each product page also links to a document, providing consumers with more in-depth information about Apple's existing devices.
title: iPhone, iPad Pages Updated With Energy Labels to Comply With New EU Regulations

description: Samsung Exynos 2500 chipset has been launched as the first processor built on the company's 3nm process technology. It boasts up to 15 percent better CPU performance and 39 percent faster on-device AI compared with the Exynos 2400 SoC. The Exynos 2500 is expected to debut next month in the upcoming Galaxy Z Flip 7 at a Galaxy Unpacked event.
title: Samsung Exynos 2500 SoC With Up to 15 Percent Improved CPU Performance, Xclipse 950 GPU Launched

description: The Tecno Spark Go 2 will launch in India on June 24 at 12pm IST via Flipkart. It will be available in black, light blue, light gold, and white shades. In a Flipkart microsite, we see the handset with a pill-shaped rear camera module and a centred hole-punch display. The phone offers AI-backed noise cancellation and is claimed to be the segment’s first to support no-network communication, enabling calls or messages without cellular service.
title: Tecno Spark Go 2 India Launch Date Set for June 24; Key Features, Colourways Teased

description: Vivo X200 FE was announced in Taiwan on Monday and the handset is available in four colour options. It has a triple rear camera unit and runs on an octa core MediaTek Dimensity 9300+ chipset. It carries a 6,500mAh battery with 90W charging support.
title: Vivo X200 FE With 6,500mAh Battery, MediaTek Dimensity 9300+ SoC Launched: Specifications

description: The Boat Airdopes Prime 701 ANC feature dual 10mm drivers, and up to 46dB ANC with 24-bit Spatial Audio. They offer quad-mic AI ENC, in-ear detection, and allow for easy EQ customisation via the Boat Hearables app. The earphones offer a 60ms low-latency Beast Mode and Google Fast Pair technology. Together with the case, they are claimed to offer a battery life of up to 50 hours.
title: Boat Airdopes Prime 701 ANC With Up to 50 Hours Total Playback Time Launched in India: Price, Features

description: China’s continued restrictions on the export of rare earth minerals could reportedly have a negative impact on India’s consumer tech supply chain job market. In 2023, the Chinese government imposed stricter export controls over seven rare earth minerals due to the ongoing tariff war and trade-related tensions. Notably, these restrictions are placed on dysprosium, gadolinium, lutetium, samarium, scandium, terbium, and yttrium.
title: China’s Restrictions on Rare Earth Mineral Exports to Reportedly Adversely Impact Supply Chain Jobs in India

description: Huaweo Mate XT Ultimate Design was launched in September last year as the world’s first tri-fold phone. Now, the brand has reportedly started work on the Mate XT’s successor. The Mate XT 2 is tipped to see a September launch, similar to its predecessor. It is said to be undergoing internal testing and could offer satellite connectivity support.
title: Huawei Mate XT 2 Launch Timeline Leaked; Said to Offer Satellite Connectivity

description: Kabul is a six-episode mini-series that captures the fear, urgency, and chaos during the U.S. withdrawal from Afghanistan in 2021. Centred around diplomats and an Afghan family, the show blends political tension with emotional storytelling and is available to stream in Hindi and English.
title: Kabul Now Available for Streaming on Lionsgate Play: What You Need to Know About Political Thriller Online?

description: Kubera is a socio-political crime thriller featuring Dhanush in a transformative role. Directed by Sekhar Kammula, the film explores corruption, survival, and redemption. Released theatrically on June 20, 2025, the movie will be available soon for streaming on Amazon Prime Video.
title: Kubera OTT Release Reportedly Revealed: Where to Watch Dhanush Starrer Movie Online?

description: Samsung recently commenced the rollout of its Android 16-based One UI 8 beta in select markets but it was limited to the flagship Galaxy S25 series. Now, a tipster suggests that it could soon be expanded to include the Galaxy S24, Galaxy Z Flip 6, and Galaxy Z Fold 6. Further, the South Korean tech conglomerate is also tipped to bring the Android 16-based beta programme to its older handsets like the Samsung Galaxy S22 and Galaxy Z Fold 4 in July.
title: Samsung Galaxy S24, Galaxy Z Flip 6 Tipped to Get Android 16-Based One UI 8 Beta Next Week

description: Apple's 20th-generation iPhone, expected in 2027 to mark its anniversary, could feature a significant redesign, moving the selfie camera and Face ID sensors under the display, according to Bloomberg's Mark Gurman. Meanwhile, the iPhone 17 series, launching later this year, is also rumoured to sport a new rear panel design.
title: Apple's 20th Anniversary iPhone to Debut in 2027 With Under-Display Camera, Face ID: Report

description: The overall crypto market cap slipped by 1.35 percent in the last 24 hours on international exchanges. Bitcoin and Ether, both registered losses on Monday, June 23. Tether, Dogecoin, and Cardano are among the majority of cryptocurrencies that are trading in losses owing to the ongoing situation between Iran and Israel. Meanwhile, altcoins Leo and Polygon managed to retain minor gains on the price charts.
title: Bitcoin Nears $101,000 While Altcoin Prices Decline Amid Rising Geopolitical Tensions

description: BSNL recently soft launched its Q-5G Fixed Wireless Access (FWA) service in select Indian circles. Aimed at businesses and enterprises, it has been introduced with plans starting at Rs. 999 per month, which offer 100Mbps speed. Further, it will offer another higher-priced plans with faster data speeds. The pilot for the BSNL 5G FWA service will begin in September 2025 beginning with Bengaluru, Chandigarh, Pune, and select other cities in India.
title: BSNL 5G FWA Plans in India to Start at Rs. 999 a Month With 100Mbps Speed; Pilot to Begin in September

description: The Nothing Phone 3a Pro 5G has a premium design and a sleek profile. The handset packs a vivid 6.77-inch full-HD+ AMOLED display with good viewing angles. The handset also comes loaded with a Qualcomm Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 processor capable of delivering good performance. The phone also packs a triple-camera setup that offers good results in different lighting conditions. The device also features a large 5,800mAh battery and comes loaded with 50W fast charging support, which is not the fastest in the segment.
title: Nothing Phone 3a Pro 5G Long Term Review: A Blend of Style, Speed, and Power

description: Oppo K13x 5G gets a 1,000 nits bright LCD display with Corning Gorilla Glass 7i protection. It features a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC, a 6,000mAh battery with 45W SuperVOOC charging, a 50-megapixel dual rear camera unit, and an 8-megapixel selfie shooter. The K13x 5G has an IP65 dust and water-resistance rating and uses a biomimetic Sponge Shock Absorption System.
title: Oppo K13x 5G With 50-Megapixel Rear Camera, 6,000mAh Battery Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: X (formerly known as Twitter) users can now generate artificial intelligence (AI) videos using Perplexity’s chatbot on the platform. On June 19, the company announced that users can now write a prompt to generate a video when tagging “@AskPerplexity” in their posts and top-level comments. The feature is available to all X users.
title: Perplexity Bot on X Gets AI-Powered Video Generation Capability, Available to All Users

description: Redmi A4 5G was announced in India in November last year in two RAM and storage options. Now, the Xiaomi sub-brand has made the handset available in a new RAM and storage configuration in the country. The new variant offers 6GB RAM. It features the Qualcomm Snapdragon 4s Gen 2 SoC and has a 6.88-inch display.
title: Redmi A4 5G Now Available in New 6GB RAM and 128GB Storage Variant in India: Price, Availability

description: Samsung Galaxy Buds Core are rumoured to be introduced soon as the successor to the Galaxy Buds FE. The company now has teased the launch of its upcoming true-wireless-stereo (TWS) earphones via its social media handle. While the post does not confirm the moniker of the earbuds, the phrasing suggests that they may indeed debut as the Samsung Galaxy Buds Core.
title: Samsung Galaxy Buds Core Launch in India Teased: Expected Features

description: Apple is reportedly testing new colour options on the upcoming iPhone 17 and iPhone 17 Air. However, only one of the new colours will be available at launch. Both phones are said to feature 120Hz displays without ProMotion and may sport aluminium frames. The iPhone 17 could use the A18 chip, while the 17 Air might get the newer A19.
title: iPhone 17 Tipped to Be Available in New Colour Options

description: Xiaomi Mix Flip 2 and Redmi K80 Ultra will be launched in China later this week. The company will also announce the Xiaomi Pad 7S Pro, Redmi K Pad, new electric SUV and wearables during the launch event. The Xiaomi Pad 7S Pro is teased to come with XRING 01 SoC and a 12.5-inch display.
title: Xiaomi Mix Flip 2, Redmi K80 Ultra Launch Date Confirmed; Xiaomi Pad 7S Pro, Redmi K Pad to Debut Alongside

description: Nothing Phone 3 is scheduled to debut on July 1 in India and global markets. Ahead of the launch, detailed specifications of the upcoming handset have now surfaced on a social media platform. The Nothing Phone 3 is tipped to sport a 6.7-inch LTPO OLED screen. It may feature a triple rear camera unit comprising three 50-megapixel lenses. The Phone 3 is said to offer up to 100W wired fast charging and pack a 5,150mAh battery.
title: Nothing Phone 3 Tipped to Get 50-Megapixel Triple Cameras; Specifications Leak Ahead of Launch

description: Meta has announced its new smart glasses in collaboration with sports performance equipment manufacturing company Oakley. The first product of this partnership is dubbed Oakley Meta HSTN, combining the HSTN style of Oakley glasses with Meta’s artificial intelligence (AI)-backed technology. The smart glasses offer support for Meta AI, the company’s AI assistant which can respond to voice commands and fulfill queries.
title: Oakley Meta Glasses With Meta AI Assistant, 3K Camera Announced: Price, Specifications
